1.0.name: wordpress/bike-events
1.0.description:
Include a comprehensive listing of upcoming bicycle rides, races and events on your sidebar with links to more information.
Pick a U.S. ZIP code, and the widget finds nearby events within a search radius.
Pick the number of events to display.

Currently, this only works for the United States with U.S. ZIP codes. We are working on a version that will include Canada, England and Australia. If you know of a good source for cycling events in those countries, please post a comment at http://www.freehub.net/bike-events-widget

Support

For issues or feature requests, please visit http://www.freehub.net/bike-events-widget
